item.title: A message from Mr Vonesch:
item.description: For grade 10 and 11 students, if you would like to go on a service trip to Costa Rica next year, please remember to pick up an application form from Mr. Vonesch at the Chaplaincy office today. Reminder, the deadline to submit your application is February 3rd.

item.title: A message from Mme Perron:
item.description: Europe trip meeting tomorrow (Thursday) in room 125. Draw will be held for gift card fundraisers and team members are asked to deliver winning envelopes. Europe team students will be collecting gently used items of clothing, shoes, books, and small appliances for their value village fundraiser. You can drop items in Mme Perrons room from now until the 1st week of Feb. The Europe team will be selling charcuterie boards for their Feb/March fundraiser to be delivered just in time for the Easter long weekend. 1 board feeds 3-5 people and will be sold for $60.00 each. Please see Mme Perron, a Europe team member, or a staff supervisor for more information.

item.title: A message from Mrs Marcellus:
item.description: Grad photo orders have started to arrive. If you ordered grad photos, please check in Guidance with Mrs Marcellus to pick them up. Thanks!

item.title: A message from Mr. Kwok:
item.description: Tomorrow is the last day to purchase a yearbook. it is payable via School Cash Online.

item.title: A message from Mr. Decoste
item.description: Quick meeting at 9:05 in room 148 today for 7/8 boys volleyball.
